name: 2048 Merger
description:
2048 Merger is a wonderful casual 2048 game for people who want to kill time, reduce pressure and train brain.

Combine cards with the same value to create a higher value card. Combine them to make the exponentiation of 2 until 2048.

Features:
● Super addictive 2048 gameplay!
● Make the Combo to get higher score
● No Time limite. Plan before you move!
● Use the Hammer Tool to remove selected blocks
● Use the Swap Tool to swap the 2 blocks

Download this new 2048 game to enjoy the endless fun!
